mapper.select:
select w.id, s.name, w.start_time, w.end_time, LEFT(w.current_plan, 15) as current_plan, LEFT(w.next_plan, 15) as next_plan, LEFT(w.sentiment, 15) as sentiment, w.is_push from student s join week w ON s.id = w.stu_id
and s.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and (w.start_time = #{start_time} and w.end_time = #{end_time})
and w.`delete` = 0 and s.`delete` = 0
order by s.name desc

select w.id,s.name,w.start_time,w.end_time,w.current_plan,w.next_plan,w.is_push,w.sentiment from week w join student s ON w.stu_id= s.id
and w.id=#{id}
